description: Gunvein is a dynamic, aggression-based bullet hell shoot em up where you use lock on lasers, charged weapons, bombs & hypers to overwhelm the enemies before they overwhelm you.

name: Icosi-Do
description: Your superpower is your patience. Nurture it with this single-player minimalist puzzle based on pure logic: swap pairs of colored rods such that all four rods that meet in any of 30 corners have different colors. Thousands of problems await you: from trivial to superhuman difficult.

name: XP Soccer
description: XP Soccer is a game designed to look and feel like your favourite soccer games from the NES era!

name: Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration
description:
Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration takes players on an interactive journey through 50 years of video games via interviews with designers, developers and industry leaders, documentary footage, product design documents, high-resolution original artwork, and a specially-curated list of more than 90 playable games.

At the heart of Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration are the Interactive Timelines, which combine historical trivia, digital artifacts, all-new video interviews, and playable games into one singular experience. When you encounter a game in the Timeline, you can immediately play it without losing your place.

The massive list of games spans six original Atari console and home computer platforms and generations of arcade titles, the most ever included in a collection by the team at Digital Eclipse. For the first time ever, games from the cult favorite Atari Jaguar and Atari Lynx platforms will be playable on modern consoles. Behind every game are the stories of Atari, what was happening at the company, what went into the creation of the games and the hardware on which they ran, all told by the people who were there. It is a rare opportunity to get a rich behind-the-scenes look at the history of video games.

In addition to presenting these Atari classics exactly as they were, the talented team at Digital Eclipse has also created the Reimagined series—six new games that revisit, mash-up and reimagine Atari Classics. Each of these new games is included in Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration.

name: The Last Door: Legacy Edition
description: ​Feel what it's really like to be alone in the dark in this multi-award-winning, lo-res 'point-and-click' horror-thriller adventure. Explore old mansions, run-down neighborhoods, and underground caves with only a flashlight and magnifying glass to guide you.

name: Link the Cubes
description: Link The Cubes is a relaxing puzzle game with cute little cubes. Solve the puzzle levels by connecting the cubes and moving them to the goal.

name: Paper Flight: Speed Rush
description: Paper Flight – Speed Rush is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. You jump into the role of a little paper plane that is supposed to rescue the world from little but evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

name: Space Menace
description: Space Menace is a real-time sci-fi space exploration and space battle game. You play as a space captain, seeking fortune and glory as you see fit. War rages across the galaxy. Factions are fighting for total dominance. Survive and thrive in these chaotic times.

name: Seasons
description: Take a journey through the seasons across 48 unique levels. Seasons is 2d platformer with simple charming visuals, relaxing music and plenty of features for you to find along the way.

name: Dreams of Pain
description: Dreams of Pain is a highly experimental first-person mystery horror game with elements of horror in its atmosphere. The structure of the game is mostly linear. The game incorporates ARG-like elements into its storytelling. The game's art style was inspired by retro games from the late '90s. It doesn't hold your hand and there are no traditional tutorials for the player. Some of the puzzles in the game are types of puzzles not seen in any game before.

name: Astral Shipwright
description: Build and upgrade your personal ship to travel around a strange new planet.

name: Imprisoned Hyperion
description: Imprisoned Hyperion is an immersive sim, first-person RPG. Explore the dark and dangerous dungeons of a world that has survived its end. Survive by finding safe resting places and cooking food. Help different creatures and learn the dark history of this world and your own.

name: Sun Meiqi Mystery: Yuer Hutong
description: Sin descripción

name: Jabroni Brawl: Episode 3
description: Jabroni Brawl: Episode 3 is a free multiplayer Source Engine game featuring an enormous variety of game modes, weapons and maps. It draws heavy inspiration from various forgotten Half-Life 1 mods, plus anything else we can think of.

name: SwordQuest: AirWorld
description:
The fourth and final game in the SwordQuest series. Ever since the glorious history of this franchise with it's comics, merchandise, and competitions, the story sadly never got it's conclusion back then with the 3rd entry: Waterworld, being considered the last... until now! The Atari and Digital Eclipse Heavens have opened up to finally allow us to experience the 4th and Final Entry!
Ascend into the the heavens in Swordquest: AirWorld!
The game finally release 2022 as part of the Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration.

name: Megaton Musashi: Cross
description:
Megaton Musashi X is set on Earth in the year 2118. The main characters pilot giant machines called “Musashi” to combat the Dorakuta, invaders from outer space that destroyed the planet in a matter of days.

This game was originally called Megaton Musashi and released on November 11th 2021 in Japan. They later decided to go free-to-play and re-branded the game as Megaton Musashi X.

name: Project Hive
description: Enter the world of a not-so distant future, a reality where people transfer their minds into fully virtual environments. In this world, a new game, “Project Hive”, is the most popular form of entertainment - but what secrets does the Hive hold? Discover for yourself!

name: Sewer Jam 2
description: 17 stinky sewer-themed maps (+ custom start map) running on a pre-release version of Alkaline 1.2 (already included), "created by a bunch of cool people" over a 4-week period.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Urban Terrain Vehicle
description: Make Brighton even safer, officer! Preorder Police Simulator now and get the UTV (Urban Terrain Vehicle) as your new police SUV - allowing you to arrest up to four suspects at the same time.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: Challengers Pack
description: Challengers Pack adds 5 brand new cars to the main game. The Audi R8 LMS GT3 EVO II, BMW M2 CS Racing, Ferrari 488 GT3 Challenge Evo, Lamborghini Huracan Super Trofeo EVO 2, Porsche 911 GT3 Cup (Type 992)

name: Texas Lane'em Poker
description: Texas Hold'em Poker on 3 different lanes against the dealer.

name: Shepherd's Crossing
description:
Shepherd’s Crossing is a different kind of box garden simulation game that pursues the fun of increasing what you want and creating the landscape of your choice.

You have been entrusted with a miniature garden (farm)! Use the farm to raise animals and crops. Animals and crops can be exchanged with others. While there may be a main story, the ultimate goal is up to you. There are no time limits, so enjoy creating a relaxed and carefree farm landscape!

name: Memetric: Classic
description: It's a "side-scrolling" real-time strategy game, pixelart style, with a few small "rouge-lite" elements. You have to collect and farm creatures, various bizarre creatures, to further develop your territory and eventually defeat the evil force that has been organizing against you throughout the game.

name: Luma
description: Luma is laser based sliding puzzle game for Commodore Amiga where the goal is to connect lasers to targets of same color by using mirrors to deflect the beam. Activate the lasers using batteries. Each level must be solved within a specific amount of moves (shifts).

name: The Sims 4: Everyday Clutter Kit
description: Craft spaces that look loved and lived-in with The Sims 4 Everyday Clutter Kit.

name: The Sims 4: Pastel Pop Kit
description: Design a soft and playful bedroom that’s perfect for daydreaming with The Sims 4 Pastel Pop Kit.

name: Sex Adventures: The Naughty Maid
description: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a very naughty maid who shamelessly interrupts the romantic evening of a vacationing couple. She refuses to sell her uniform, but makes an offer to join in their fun.

name: First Time in Rome: Collector's Edition
description: Kate and Nicole enjoy everything the city of Rome has to offer. Will Kate still find time to complete the assignment?

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Hero of Justice Pack 1
description: Play as characters from the Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero movie! Gamma 1, Gamma 2, and Gohan (DBS Super Hero) are available in addition to new movie-related Parallel Quests, Additional Moves, Costumes, and much more!

name: Big Kids Games Collection Bundle
description: This children's games learning pack contains 6 fantastic children's games!

name: Montgomery Fox and the Case of the Diamond Necklace
description: Very valuable diamond necklace was stolen. Police were unable to find the thief. It's your turn to show your detective skills!

name: Montgomery Fox and the Revenge of Victor Draven
description: Montgomery Fox is accused of serious crime, while someone else is the culprit. Can you help Montgomery and find a man with a thousand faces?

name: The Simorgh
description: A text-based adventure for the Playdate.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Hero of Justice Pack Set
description: The Hero of Justice Pack Set bundles together both Packs 1 and 2!

name: Labyrinth: Classic Pinball Puzzle
description: A classic pinball puzzle game in which you have to roll the ball to the end of the maze!

name: Steelrising: Cagliostro's Secrets
description: Uncover the darkest secrets of the King's agent, the Comte de Cagliostro, and seek out the revolutionary Jacques Pierre Brissot.

name: Legend of Keepers: Complete Edition
description: You have been hired as a dungeon manager. Your job is simple: protect dungeons!

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Slitherlink
description: Connect the dots to create a single loop in the best original puzzle by Nikoli!

name: Isekai Musume to Konkatsuchuu: Isekai Bride Hunting - Chartier Edition
description: In a universe where the Earth has merged with another world, the hunt for a bride from another world begins!

name: Arcade Archives: Baraduke
description:
"Baraduke" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1985.
The peaceful, friendly world of paccet has been attacked by the evil Octy!
Make your way through Baraduke, the underground Octy citadel beneath paccet, and use your Wave Gun and Shield to take out the Octy!

name: A Hundred Kinds of Your Smile
description: A fun and causal girl's love RPG game, with some puzzles to solve. An adventure to save the lover through many parallel worlds.

name: GrassGames Hearts 3
description: The best Hearts Card Game around.

name: Pipeline Panic
description: Good old fashioned 2D arcade fun with tons of upgrades and fast paced action where taking risks is rewarded with a higher score. Defend humanity's last source of energy wrench in one hand, laser gun in the other

name: Space Ranger: First Meet
description: Space Ranger: First Meet... is a short first-person shooter. In this game, you have to fight your way through hordes of robots in search of a safe place. You will use the environment to overcome obstacles and find a way out.

name: A Path to the Princess
description: Find best way to fulfil your dream.. That's obviously getting the girl - or should I say "saving the princess"? Between you and your dreams, there is only simple puzzles! Beware the holes, be fast, get her!

name: Early Worm
description: Early Worm gets the Apple! Fun puzzle platformer full twisty action!

name: Ora ga Watashi ni Naru Made: Becoming a She
description:
Ora ga Watashi ni Naru Made: Becoming a She is a visual novel game in which the protagonist, "Rin Hoshina," who becomes a girl after a year, spends an unusual school life with the girls he meets at the girl's academy, he has transferred.
This Bishojo Game released in 2017 under the "Noirsoft" brand has been reworked for the "CS Novel Club" platform for players of all ages worldwide to enjoy.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Angel's Blood
description:
The girl with the strength to defeat large androids with a single blow, Minase Akari.
The rebel with the hacking skills to survive in an AI-controlled society, Sakura Kurono.
A connection borne in battle and strengthened through the desire to destroy the Command Angel AI.
Enjoy seeing their attempts to understand each other as their journey continues to an exciting climax!

name: Cyber Velocity Run
description: You are thrown into a mysterious speedrunning facility where the journey begins. Handcrafted levels designed to be puzzling and unexpected.

name: ImpossiBot
description: Challenge your finger dexterity like never before by helping the cute Bot navigate through an obstacle course full of enemies and reach his final destination in this action packed puzzle game.

name: Lost Chiko
description: Lost Chiko is 2D Adventure Game, Our main character, Chiko, is lost in this universe. And it has to get somewhere.

name: Multiversepool
description: Play billiards against unique characters! Fun play in a magical space!!

name: Jurassic World Aftermath Collection
description: Jurassic World Aftermath Collection is a suspenseful survival adventure. Crash-landing on Isla Nublar after the fall of the Jurassic World theme park, players find themselves trapped in an abandoned research facility when their mission to recover valuable information goes disastrously wrong. To survive, they’ll need to explore and solve puzzles while evading a menagerie of ferocious dinosaurs, including ravenous Pteranodons, cunning Velociraptors and the terrifying T. rex.

name: Halod's adventure times
description: Hero Haload received a request for beating the king of monsters, but there are Five of them! How does Haload complete the quest, and what will happen on his journey?

name: Lustful Assistant
description: Lustful Assistant is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story tells the story of a guy who hired a very sexy girl. Working together, they became very close. Their communication very quickly led to sex.

name: Escape Academy: Escape From Anti-Escape Island
description: After surviving an eventful first year at the Academy, it’s time for a well-earned summer vacation! But when the Escape Jet is shot down over an uncharted island, relaxation turns to mayhem in this outlandish Escape Academy DLC! Escape from Anti-Escape Island includes 5 brand new escape room levels, an exciting new narrative, and more original music from doseone!

name: This Way Madness Lies
description:
Let us begin our tale, in the quiet city of Verona, Italy. A town for lovers... and giant, mutant flower attacks.

As the leader of the Stratford-Upon-Avon High Drama Society, Imogen is no ordinary girl! Sure, she goes to school every day and helps produce plays for the community, but beyond that, she's a magical girl! With her powers, she can teleport to alternate dimensions based on Shakespeare plays, fight back the forces of Nightmare, and still get back in time for dinner!

Join Imogen, Paulina, Viola, Rosalind, Miranda, Beatrice, and Kate on an epic adventure throughout the Shakespearean metaverse in this comedy JRPG!

name: Pro Basketball Manager 2023
description: Pro Basketball Manager 2023 features more than 160 basketball competitions with the most depth and authenticity ever found in a basketball management game.

name: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle - Limited Edition
description:
Arkanoid: Eternal Battle - Limited Edition includes:
- Game: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle
- 3D Lenticular
- 16-Page Instruction Booklet
- Exclusive Taito Classic In-Game Background
- Digital Original Soundtrack

name: Demolish or Die
description: Demolish or Die is an open world third person action game that takes place in a destructible, dystopian city.

name: Darq: Ultimate Edition
description:
DARQ tells the story of Lloyd, a boy who finds himself in the middle of a lucid nightmare. Unable to wake up, Lloyd has to face his fears and decipher the meaning of the dream.

The Complete Edition includes the base game + 2 DLCs + Graphic novel + Artbook + Soundtrack + Stickers

name: Garfield: Lasagna Party
description: Garfield Lasagna Party is a party game offering more than 30 mini-games. The challenges are varied and test both the player's cleverness and dexterity. All of these can be played solo or in multiplayer mode for up to four people.

name: Daydream Mosaics 3: Shards of Hope
description: Help Juliette in her new venture onto foreing lands.

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Bloody Ties
description: Tempted by riches, fame, and status, Aiden enters a bloodsport tournament where the greatest combatants fight to the death. Face off against the worst of the worst, make new allies, climb up the ladder, and claim the title of the ultimate victor.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Belgium Through the Lens
description: Enjoy a personal zen moment filled with casual gaming by solving easy, intermediate and more challenging digital jigsaw puzzles with an ever increasing number of pieces to puzzle together.

name: Skystrike: Wings of Justice
description: Use your falcon powers to soar, smash and stealth your way to victory against the RatKing’s army in this hometown hero adventure!

name: Advent Calendar
description: 25 Days, 25 surprises, 25 games! Count down to Christmas and enjoy a new present every day! Christmas Advent Calendar is the ultimate holiday season experience!

name: Overtop
description: There is only one rule – the higher you rise, the more painful it is to fall.

name: Bunny Hop: Eggstreme
description: Bunny Hop : Eggstreme is a challenging 3D first-person platformer based on the famous movement feature called "bunny hop". Beat your friends, explore the world, find all the secrets this universe offers you and become the very bester bhopper the world has ever known.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Steelbook Edition
description: Welcome to Brighton! Join the police force of this fictitious American city and experience the day to day life of a police officer.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: American Track Pack
description: The American Tracks Pack DLC for Assetto Corsa Competizione features 3 of the most iconic circuits of the United States of America. Circuit of the Americas, Indianapolis Motor Speedway and Watkins Glen International come to Assetto Corsa Competizione for the best US sim racing ever experienced!

name: Hellfire Tactics
description: Hellfire Tactics is a competitive multiplayer card strategy game. Experience intense 8 player matches while drafting from over 40 different units all with their own unique effects on the game.

name: Robo Legend
description: Robo Legend is a twin-stick shooter RPG where you blast your way through hordes of crazy robots, minigames, and puzzles. Choose to save Gear Town, or conquer it, when Voidbot and his forces invade.

name: Sex Chess
description: Hell is about to get invaded and the sinners trapped inside are about to be freed. But the clueless liberators had no idea how cunning the Devil is. This time, the war between Light and Darkness will be waged not on the battlefield, but on a chess board.

name: HyperLeague Heroes
description: Recruit. Upgrade. Battle. Assemble a team of heroes, villains, and monsters and delve into the dungeons of Utopia to face off against waves of enemies. Issue commands to your squad or watch them fight on their own.

name: Anglerfish
description: The game only saves when you die. Every time you die, something changes. Every change is based on where and how you died. Go on an epic adventure only equipped with your trusted shotgun, your wit and your strong stomach for disturbing exploration. Can you survive a night at the bar, Anglerfish?

name: Shadow of the Guild
description: Combine your lightning spells, assassin skills, and warrior power to defeat your enemies in a 2D platformer / beat'm all! And prevent Emperor Gethro III from carrying out his project! Based on the french books "La Guilde des Marchands de Pluie"

name: Among Us VR
description: Teamwork and betrayal in space! In this VR party game, Crewmates work together to complete tasks before one or more Impostors kill everyone aboard. Experience all of the same deception and deceit as the original game, but now in your own virtual Skeld.

name: Lords and Villeins
description: Build and grow your settlement in a city-building simulation of medieval society.

name: Lunistice
description: Lunistice is a 3D Platformer created with simple but fun gameplay and a cute PS1/SEGA Saturn inspired artstyle in mind. Take the role of Hana the Tanuki and jump and fight through her dreams!

name: Lila's Tale and the Hidden Forest
description: Help Lila and her friend Flee exploring the Hidden Forest of Solaria to save the Guardian Owls from the hands of the evil thiefs. Discover hidden passages, beat enemies and challenge yourself in this magical 2D platform game. Game demo still in development, leave us feedback!

name: Alkali
description:
Alkali is a fast-paced precision platformer, where you must use the main character's chemical properties to traverse the levels. Collect chunks of metal to grow yourself, leap into the water for an explosive jump, or barely graze past a whirring saw with just a sliver of body remaining. Coupling traditional platformer mechanics with these new interactions, Alkali brings a novel twist on a classical genre.

The game also contains a fully fledged level editor, where anyone can get creative and make interesting and fun levels for others to play. Using the same tools that were used to create the Alkali's campaign, you can explore fun gimmicks or create difficult masterpieces as you wish.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers
description: Welcome to Brighton! Join the police force of this fictitious American city and experience the day to day life of a Police Officer. Start with citing violations and giving out parking tickets, then work your way towards shouldering more responsibilities. Be part of the community of Brighton, get to know your neighborhood and handle daily police work to fight crime during your shift. Always be tough, but fair: respect the law and gain more experience to unlock more neighborhoods, districts and duties.

name: Hats and Hand Grenades
description:
Hats and Hand Grenades is a cover-based twin-stick shooter featuring multiplayer versus battles. Shoot guns, throw grenades, take cover, and steal hats in this pixelated party game!

Up to 6-player local and online multiplayer with Steam friends. Play in teams or free-for-all. Bots can be added as needed.

Every level features unique artwork, color palette, and destructible environment.

Original music composed by Roderic Russell and DJ Beatza Hut.

name: Wild Terra 2: New Lands
description: Play your role in the life-filled medieval world controlled by players. Live on an inhabited territory or conquer New Continents in new seasons! MMORPG full of logically interconnected worked out little things that create a unique immersion and the spirit of adventure!

name: Fabular: Once upon a Spacetime
description: Fabular: Once upon a Spacetime is an indie action-RPG in space with roguelike influences, set in a Medieval, folktale-inspired fantasy universe. As a young knight, go on an adventure in a surreal, storybook-like galaxy in your trusty spaceship.

name: Common'hood
description: Common’hood is a community building and economy management game with highly customizable base building tools. Scavenge for materials, grow your own food, research new technology, craft new tools, build a home, make friends. Form your community and take it from surviving to thriving!

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - A Treacherous Adventure
description: A Treacherous Adventure is a free new content update for Warhammer: Vermintide 2 containing a two-part adventure.

name: Innkeeper VR
description:
Your Medieval Tavern Awaits!

Step into the shoes of a medieval tavern keeper in a bustling fantasy world! In Innkeeper VR, you control every detail of your tavern, from cooking to cleaning, serving to managing unruly guests.

name: FIFA World Cup 2022
description: Compete as one of the 32 qualified teams in a complete solo recreation of the FIFA World Cup 2022, either playing from the opening match or customizing your tournament experience by changing groups and including teams that didn’t qualify for the FIFA World Cup finals in a Custom Tournament. In Online Tournament Mode, progress through the knockout stages with any of the 32 qualified countries, and go for FIFA World Cup glory against others from around the world.

name: Fortnite: Checkered Past Pack
description: Much like her trusty Thudthumper, Veronika is blunt and to the point. Includes an Outfit, a Back Bling, a Pickaxe, a Wrap and 600 V-Bucks.

name: Merge Bistro
description: Are you ready to become the ultimate culinary mastermind? Then step into the world of Merge Bistro, where you’ll create mouth-watering dishes by merging different elements and running your very own restaurant!

name: Of Them That Have a Name
description: A short game about memorials.

name: Cat Cafe 101
description: You aim to collect 101 cats. You can also collect the cafe’s food recipes and furniture! They'll come to the cat cafe if you buy canned cat food and give it to a cat.

name: Aswang Detective: The Case of New York
description: You were a simple detective, but after a weird dream, you got a contract for one million dollars to find info on the Daemon-Lance corporation. After things went south, you were left for dead to come back as an Aswang. With your new demonic powers, you must solve the case and undercover the mystery!

name: The Pale Man
description:
You wake up in a park, in the middle of the night.

Has someone trapped you?

Escape without getting caught!

name: Mad Skills Snocross
description: Experience the awesome thrill of snowmobile racing with Mad Skills Snocross, an intense racing game for all ages.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: USA Route - Far Northern Mountains
description: Set in the northern regions of the USA, this fictional railroad through a steep mountain valley in a cold summer climate, and spruce forests. With steep gradients, you will be working your locomotives hard to travel this route, which includes 2 sessions.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Colorful Sweets
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Animals in Snow
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Masterpieces of World - Dogs and Cats in the Painting
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Medial
description: Soduku-style puzzles.

name: Neogeo Pocket Color Selection Vol.2
description: Neogeo Pocket Color Selection Vol.2 The second wave of the dream collection is here! Ten new Neogeo Pocket Color masterpieces are included!

name: Madorica Real Estate 2
description: The sequel to Madorica Real Estate released in 2018.

name: House Builder & Thief Simulator
description:
House Builder
Become a one-man construction crew! Travel around the world and through the ages to build iconic designs! Beware unpleasant temperatures and dangerous fauna!

Thief Simulator
Become the best thief. Gather intel, steal things and sell them to buy hi-tech equipment. Do everything that a real thief does.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Slitherlink
description: In this - one of Nikoli's most awesome original puzzles - you connect the dots to make a single ring. "Slitherlink" is a puzzle in which you connect dots with a line according to the rules. The greatest attraction is the fact that there exist an unlimited number of set sequences known as "theorems". With this puzzle, you can actually feel your own skill level rising with each theorem you learn.

name: House Builder & Tank Mechanic Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Ninja Miner
description: He slices! He dices! He... mines? Tag along with this crazy ninja on a treasure-filled adventure.

name: Arcade Archives: Itazura Tenshi
description:
Draw beautiful constellations in the night sky,
capture the heart of a celestial maiden in your hand!

name: The Tower
description: The Tower is a casual-action style game with various levels and a final boss level. In this game, one must find or craft new weapons to defeat your foes, the chicken army. Along with enemy chickens, the Chicken Elder has also set up various traps and obstacles that block your way to him. Good luck!

name: Cocktail Rush
description: Cocktail Rush is a match 3 game with visual novel elements and nice hand-drawn graphics. You need to help the cute bar workers with the work at the bar by connecting the same drinks into groups.

name: Monster Hunters: Frost Giant
description: Follow the exciting adventures of this monster hunting family as they bring you on an epic journey. What started as a coming of age story quickly turned into a fight for survival when an ancient apocalyptic giant suddenly appeared.

name: ARK: Dinosaur Discovery
description:
Take a journey through the epochs in this family-friendly educational experience that invites players to learn about the fascinating prehistoric creatures which inspired ARK: Survival Evolved.

Explore The Island across land, sea and air where you can discover 64 dinosaurs, all based on their real life, prehistoric counterparts. Ride a huge Tyrannosaurus Rex across the beautiful landscape, soar above the tree tops on the back of a Pteranodon, and even glide through the oceans while riding an ancient Megalodon Shark!

Unlock each creature’s Dino Book for fun-filled science facts and illustrations, all voiced by Madeleine Madden (ARK: The Animated Series, The Wheel of Time) as HLN-A. Cap off your adventure with a custom-built base, choosing from a variety of over 30 building pieces unlocked throughout your adventures.

Can you discover all of the Dinosaurs and become the Ultimate Explorer?

name: Underground Sheriff
description: It's time to make a law even where there is none. The underground world is going to be populated. But as long as danger and insecurity persist there, the world cannot do anything. You're going to manage on your own, because that's the only way you'll prove that you're a real sheriff who fights for his territory.

name: Masarada Town Story
description: This is Masarada Town. It is a lonely town that few tourists visit. That's why I, Takarayama Jewel, were sent to this small town to work hard to mine rare ores!

name: The Iron Age
description:
This year you have been assigned to be the CEO of the Iron mine.
To start mining the iron and become the biggest iron mine in the world.
Good Luck and Have Fun.

name: God of War Ragnarök: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
God of War: Ragnarök is the ninth instalment in the God of War series and the sequel to 2018's God of War. Continuing with the Norse mythology theme, the game is set in ancient Norway and features series protagonists Kratos, the former Greek God of War, and his young son Atreus. The game kicked off the events of Ragnarök, where Kratos and Atreus must journey to each of the Nine Realms in search of answers as they prepare for the prophesied battle that will end the world.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

- Full game
- Darkdale Armour
- Darkdale Attire (Cosmetic)
- Darkdale Axe Grip
- Darkdale Blades Handles
- Dark Horse digital art book
- Official digital soundtrack
- PSN avatar set for PS4/PS5
- PlayStation 4 theme

name: Humankind: Together We Rule
description: Unite Humankind with the Together We Rule Expansion Pack!

name: Weaponeer
description: Control your character with two buttons and fight your way through 90+ levels of retro platforming that introduce new and original content.

name: Mess Quest
description: In Mess Quest, arrive at the aftermath of numerous wacky scenarios to clean, mop, and put things back together! Grab a bucket and a mop and get swinging. What’s that green stuff? Where did that bone come from? We don't get paid to ask questions, we get paid to clean!

name: Super DynoStory
description: Explore, Shoot, Jet Pack and Bird? your way across colourful and dangerous worlds to stop The EVIL Pallid who's stolen your gold! Meet many hilarious characters and enjoy silly dynamic cut scenes that force you to think outside the box.

name: Goat's Tale 2
description: The Goat is back in his next adventure! The challenge will be difficult, but only with your help he will be able to get to the top.

name: A Castle Full of Cats
description: A Castle Full of Cats is a catvania hidden object game were you need to find all the cursed cats in the castle. Save each and every cat and unleash the power of love!

name: God of War Ragnarök: Launch Edition
description:
God of War: Ragnarök is the ninth instalment in the God of War series and the sequel to 2018's God of War. Continuing with the Norse mythology theme, the game is set in ancient Norway and features series protagonists Kratos, the former Greek God of War, and his young son Atreus. The game kicked off the events of Ragnarök, where Kratos and Atreus must journey to each of the Nine Realms in search of answers as they prepare for the prophesied battle that will end the world.

The Launch Edition includes:
- PS4 game (physical)
- Kratos Risen Snow armor
- Atreus Risen Snow tunic

name: God of War Ragnarök: Jötnar Edition
description:
God of War: Ragnarök is the ninth instalment in the God of War series and the sequel to 2018's God of War. Continuing with the Norse mythology theme, the game is set in ancient Norway and features series protagonists Kratos, the former Greek God of War, and his young son Atreus. The game kicked off the events of Ragnarök, where Kratos and Atreus must journey to each of the Nine Realms in search of answers as they prepare for the prophesied battle that will end the world.

The Jötnar Edition includes:

- Full game
- Kratos Darkdale Armo DLC
- Atreus Darkdale Attire DLC
- Darkdale Blades Handles for the Blades of Chaos DLC
- Darkdale Axe Grip for the Leviathan Axe DLC
- Avatar Set DLC
-Dark Horse Digital Mini Artbook DLC
- Official God of War Ragnarök Digital Soundtrack DLC,
- 7-Inch vinyl record with music by Bear McCrear
- The Draupnir Ring
- Brok’s Dice Set
- Yggdrasil Cloth Map
- Steelbook
- 2” Vanir Twins Carvings
- 16” Mjölnir Replica
- PlayStation 4 Theme DLC

name: God of War Ragnarök: Collector's Edition
description:
God of War: Ragnarök is the ninth instalment in the God of War series and the sequel to 2018's God of War. Continuing with the Norse mythology theme, the game is set in ancient Norway and features series protagonists Kratos, the former Greek God of War, and his young son Atreus. The game kicked off the events of Ragnarök, where Kratos and Atreus must journey to each of the Nine Realms in search of answers as they prepare for the prophesied battle that will end the world.

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Full game
- Kratos Darkdale Armo DLC
- Atreus Darkdale Attire DLC
- Darkdale Blades Handles for the Blades of Chaos DLC
- Darkdale Axe Grip for the Leviathan Axe DLC
- Avatar Set DLC
- Dark Horse Digital Mini Artbook DLC
- Official God of War Ragnarök Digital Soundtrack DLC (while supplies last).
- Steelbook
- 2” Vanir Twins Carvings
- Dwarven Dice Set
- 16” Mjölnir Replica
- PlayStation 4 Theme DLC

name: Christmas Fever!
description: Classic 2D platformer with powerups. Holidays are approaching, so get in the Christmas mood by playing Christmas Fever! Help santa collect coins to buy gifts for Christmas!

name: Once Upon a Jester
description:
Travel the kingdom as Jester with his best friend Sok to improvise theatre shows and perform on stages far and wide. Sing your hearts out, crack jokes and impress audiences to become the stars of the famous Royal Theatrical Spectacle!

They embark on a grand adventure across a fantasy kingdom, meeting tons of wacky characters, performing improvised shows and singing their hearts out. Along the way, they unintentionally discover the freedom and joy of musical theatre. Will the pair change their wicked ways or do whatever it takes to get rich?

name: Path of Kami
description: Path of Kami follows the spirit of recently-deceased Japanese wolf Kazeyo as he navigates the trials of the Mortal and Spirit World through puzzles. He is accompanied by Wisp, a wolf spirit embodying both his mother and his more distant ancestors, who is there to guide him on his journey.

name: God of War Ragnarök
description: God of War: Ragnarök is the ninth installment in the God of War series and the sequel to 2018's God of War. Continuing with the Norse mythology theme, the game is set in ancient Norway and features series protagonists Kratos, the former Greek God of War, and his young son Atreus. The game kicked off the events of Ragnarök, where Kratos and Atreus must journey to each of the Nine Realms in search of answers as they prepare for the prophesied battle that will end the world.

name: Academy of Magic: Ring of Darkness
description: Sin descripción

name: Football Manager 2024 Touch
description: Progress never stops when you’re pursuing footballing greatness. Gameplay upgrades empower you to develop a blueprint for success on and off the pitch.

name: Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising Nemesis Pack
description: Strike first with the Nemesis Pack: The Nemeses: Go to the mat with the martial arts prowess of Terry Silver, Hammer, Bo, Gabriel and Skeleton Lord in All Valley Tournament mode, Jukebox Mode: Choose your track, rock out and punish your enemies with an all-original Cobra Kai score

name: Tomb of the Old Lords
description: Tomb of the Old Lords is a challenging map with classic gameplay set in Hell. Sink into the depths of the old tomb and carve through flesh and blood to your freedom. I put an emphasis on both the visuals and the combat design, and this represents the most complicated map I've completed, mechanically speaking (close to 100 unique sector/linedef tags and multi-stage voodoo doll closets for scripts). I chose to work with only vanilla textures to get back to basics and challenge myself on the visual design.

name: Triviaverse
description: Highest score wins! Challenge a friend or beat a mysterious foe by answering random rapid-fire trivia questions on science, art, geography and more.

name: Pãozito
description: In the game, you help a magical bun named Pãozito pop balloons and dodge traps so you can earn resources to save the Breakfast Kingdom. It has hundreds of levels filled with a wide variety of trap combinations that will challenge your skills. Each level may need a different strategy, but that's up to you!

name: Family Chess: Definitive Edition
description: Pick your favorite Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enyojed by people of all ages.

name: A Steak Temple Panic: Chapter 2 - Welcome to Sanglinours
description: Second chapter of Bob and Jenn's adventures. The two secret agents arrive at the Sanglinours entertainment park. Will they find the Xiuhcoatl?

name: Emi: New Beginning
description: A short adult visual novel about Emi, a beautiful young woman who is back from college to stay with you while she figures out her next move in life. The game features 260+ 4K pre-rendered stills and 10+ 4K animated scenes, which vary depending on your choices.

name: Halo Infinite: Winter Update
description: This is the largest feature update to Halo Infinite yet, bringing with it a number of highly anticipated experiences such as Campaign Network Co-Op, Mission Replay, the Forge Beta, and a plethora of new, free content for all players.

name: Meowjiro
description: Working as a convenience store clerk, you need to ring up purchases, clean the store, keep track of stock inventory, warm up bentos, make ice creams. Use your wage to furnish your home and raise Meowjiro.

name: The Letter: Classic Edition
description: The Letter: Classic Edition is the ORIGINAL experience from the classic title "The Letter", with a few changes and additions. Relive the Wii U game that gathered so much hate it became a cult classic. Embark on a creepy narrative driven tale about a boy in search of his missing father.

name: The Cleaner
description:
Play as a mysterious trauma cleaner as he faces the end of society as we know it, brought to its knees by a new and unknown phenomenon that has no cure.

Having given up on most things, every day feels to him like the same sluggish chore of waking up, cleaning, going to sleep and repeating.

That is, until he receives a request like none other from a man he barely knows.

name: Paragonian 3: The Warrior of Light
description: Paragonian 3: The Warrior of Light is an ARPG that plays alone. Explore the Oriental World! Gwang, who lost his mind in the fight against Laijin, the god of lightning, is rescued by the chief of the village. He will lose Inner Qi in the fight against Laijin and must regain his strength.

name: The Heart Defenders
description: Building defender 2D strategy game! Place building and gather resources. Use the resources you collect to then build towers that will defend your heart in the middle of the map. Survive as many levels as you can manage! Good luck!

name: Feathered Run: Worlds
description: Feathered Run: Worlds - This is a 4-button platformer runner for accuracy, made in 2D graphics. Embark on an exciting escape across any part of the world, for example, to Antarctica, the desert or the jungle!

name: Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising - Nemesis Edition
description:
For the aspiring karate master, sweep the leg with the Nemesis Edition of Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising. Dominate and stun your opponents in the All Valley Tournament mode with 5 exclusive, playable boss characters, including Terry Silver. Then crank up the bass with a choose-your-own track Jukebox mode.

Strike first with this edition that includes: The base version of Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising, The Nemeses: Go to the mat and unleash the martial art skills of Terry Silver, Hammer, Bo, Gabriel, and Skeleton Lord in the All-Valley Tournament mode Jukebox Mode: Choose your track, rock out and punish your enemies with an all-original new score from the official Cobra Kai composers: Zach Robinson and Leo Birenberg.

name: Orcen Axe
description: Orcen Axe is a 2D pixel metroidvania. As the orc Drak, you'll have to face a world that's not at all like you remember it. Use your magical axe in creative ways - learn new attacks, wield elemental powers and dash high into the skies. This journey has a lot in store for you: travel through the war-torn countryside, the cliffs at the end of the world, explore ruined cities, caverns and abandoned mines, and restore the kingdom to its former glory.

name: Survival Academy
description: A dangerous class to survive begins! A 30-minute scuffle in the mysterious space of Quasar! Prove, my dear, that you deserve to be the master of Quasar...

name: Super Clown 3: Revenge
description: Sorcerer and his army has captured Stars who keep peace in world. So Super Clown is only brave hero who can defeat enemy army and evil leaders to save Stars

name: Farmhand Go!
description: A casual and easygoing game where you save the farm by growing and selling crops for the best price you can get!

name: Franchise Hockey Manager 9
description: Franchise Hockey Manager 9 is the latest (2022) version of the Franchise Hockey Manager series. Releasing in October of 2022, FHM9 continues to build off of its previous versions and has added a variety of new features. Franchise Hockey Manager is the only NHL Licensed game on PC.

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1944
description: The war on the Eastern Front has reached fever pitch. Wehrmacht forces across the Eastern Front find themselves under immense pressure from a resurgent Red Army.

name: Search All: Mice
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the mice in a large location. The mice will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Buds
description: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the buds (flowers) on a large location. The buds (flowers) will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Astro Aqua Kitty: Pawsome Collection
description: The Aqua Kitty cats have launched into space in an all new action RPG shoot-em-up adventure! Pick your crew, then blast off to investigate mysterious water filled asteroids.

name: Football Manager 2023
description: New tools thrust you closer to every aspect of the beautiful game in FM23. Get ready for your journey towards footballing glory.

name: Sonic Frontiers: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Worlds are colliding in Sonic the Hedgehog’s newest high-speed adventure! In search of the missing Chaos emeralds, Sonic becomes stranded on an ancient island teeming with unusual creatures. Battle hordes of powerful enemies as you explore a breathtaking world of action, adventure, and mystery. Accelerate to new heights and experience the thrill of high-velocity, open-zone platforming freedom as you race across the five massive Starfall Islands. Jump into adventure, wield the power of the Ancients, and fight to stop these new mysterious foes. Welcome to the evolution of Sonic games! Experience All-New Open Zone Platforming Race across five massive overworld islands brimming with dense forests, overflowing waterfalls, and sizzling desert landscapes, each with their own unique action-platforming challenges and hidden secrets to uncover. Unparalleled High-Speed FreedomAdventure across the Starfall Islands and see what each has to offer at the speed that only Sonic can deliver. Blaze a trail as you see fit and discover side quests, solve puzzles, scale enormous structures, go fishing, and encounter a friendly face or two along the way… Challenge Yourself In Cyber SpaceDiscover portals scattered across the island and venture into Cyber Space levels through portals scattered across the islands featuring signature 3D platforming at Sonic speeds, packed with challenges to put your skills to the test. Cyber-Powered CombatThe Starfall Islands are home to strange creatures Sonic has never encountered before. Use the all-new battle system and skill tree upgrades to fight strategically, combining moves such as dodges, parries, counters, combos, and the new Cyloop ability to take down mysterious foes and colossal titans. A New Adventure Full of Mystery and IntrigueBecome Sonic and journey to uncover the mysteries of the remains of an ancient civilization plagued by robotic hordes. With nothing but a handful of questions and a disembodied voice to guide you, set out to save your friends and the enigmatic inhabitants of the Starfall Islands from a colossal, mechanized threat.

name: Xeno Command
description: Defend galaxy against Alien invasion in the RTS offline game with roguelike fun.

name: Kaiju Klash
description: Kaiju Klash is a turn-based fighter where you build your own giant monster and fight to climb the ranks of the arena against other perilous, and sometimes wacky, monster combinations. Each monster part offers unique stats and abilities so you can fight how you want!

name: Is It You?
description: Is It You? is an online social deduction game set in a mushroom world. Voice chat with other players and use the abilities of your role to find out who's friend or foe. For up to 15 players.

name: Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising
description: Immersing fans with what they love about the series, Cobra Kai 2 offers players a unique perspective from all 3 competing dojos-featuring an engaging "pick your story" narrative campaign that will shape the entire story, ending, and even who the player controls.​

name: Memory Hunters
description: A classic RPG where you will experience unique places, solve puzzles, fight turn-based battles and live an exciting adventure.

name: Eternal Evolution
description: Sin descripción

name: Hidden Objects Collection: Volume 4
description: Search through lavishly illustrated and animated backgrounds. Play over 30 fun minigames, restoring one piece of art at a time! Enjoy the winter wonderland of Mia's hometown, Mikamaw Point! Meet Mia's family and the neighbors she grew up with as she catches up with them! Spread joy to the citizens of this lovely community as you help them through their annual Christmas donation drives!

name: Arpsic
description: Arpsic is a casual musical rhythm game. With Arpsic, you can train yourself with intuitive lessons, learn the treble clef, bass clef, and more!

name: Winter Falling: Battle Tactics
description: Lead troops in tense tactical battles, just you and your brain against the dying world. Manage a mercenary company, scavenge supplies, build an army. Go on a quest! Burn down a village or two... Inspired by Warhammer, FTL and Total War.

name: A Little to the Left
description: A Little To The Left is a cozy puzzle game that has you sort, stack, and organize household items into pleasing arrangements while you keep an eye out for a mischievous cat with an inclination for chaos. Check out this playful and intuitive puzzler with 75+ satisfying messes to tidy.

name: Nadir: A Grimdark Deckbuilder
description: Nadir is a roguelike deck-builder with a twist: the cost to play a card is an enemy reaction you can predict. Craft your own cards to slay powerful demons. Gather resources, expand your city, grow in power and conquer the underworld.

name: Snapshot VR
description: Snapshot is a VR arena shooter built for e-sports with competitive solo and team play. Inspired by the real-life sport, Snapshot feels like playing paintball in the future. One shot, one kill. In competitive teams of up to 5, communication and coordination are the keys to victory.
